snippet: South Sudan said Thursday that it was prepared, under certain conditions, to withdraw from the contested city of Heglig, which it captured from Sudanese forces this week, under certain conditions.
abstract: South Sudan says that it is prepared to withdraw from the contested city of Heglig, which it captured from Sudanese forces, under certain conditions, but it also says that it is prepared to send its army back to Abyei, another contested city along the border.
lead_paragraph: South Sudan said Thursday that it was prepared, under certain conditions, to withdraw from the contested city of Heglig, which it captured from Sudanese forces this week, under certain conditions.
